file.name: b.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: ""
  version: ""
servers:
  - url: /
paths:
  /api/foo:
    get:
      responses:
        200:
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json;charset=utf-8:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Bad"
components:
  schemas:
    Bad:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/Bad"

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /api/foo: get: operation "": responses: 200: content: "application/json;charset=utf-8": schema: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/Bad": parse schema: allOf: [0]: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/Bad": infinite recursion
